医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
健康的生活方式可降低患严重肝病的风险研究人员调查了新发严重非酒精性脂肪肝中健康生活方式与 Life's Essential 8 评分之间的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/A-healthy-lifestyle-reduces-risk-of-developmenting-severe-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/A-healthy-lifestyle-reduces-risk-of-developmenting-severe-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=461f6357-8db9-4321-b79c-3ab7838aab3d Thu, 29 Jun 2023 22:48:00 -0400 A healthy lifestyle reduces risk of developing severe liver disease
利用机器学习的力量开发沉思的预测模型我们的思想经常陷入重复的想法中，例如过去的错误、遗憾、不安全感或未解决的冲突。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Using-the-power-of-machine-learning-to-develop-a-predictive-model-of-rumination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Using-the-power-of-machine-learning-to-develop-a-predictive-model-of-rumination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de9bbaa8-5481-4e04-af29-9b9af249d7de Thu, 29 Jun 2023 22:45:20 -0400 Using the power of machine learning to develop a predictive model of rumination
生活在历史红线社区可能会增加肾衰竭的风险新的研究表明，历史上红线社区对健康和财富资源的长期投资减少可能导致当今黑人成年人肾衰竭的比例过高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Living-in-a-historically-redlined-neighborhood-may-increase-risk-of-kidney-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Living-in-a-historically-redlined-neighborhood-may-increase-risk-of-kidney-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=586d4245-2dc4-4fe5-bba3-aa1e9de7c8d7 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 22:37:22 -0400 Living in a historically redlined neighborhood may increase risk of kidney failure
新方法可以追踪活细胞中蛋白质的完整活性我们 DNA 中的遗传计划通过蛋白质实现功能性成果，蛋白质是我们身体结构和活动的基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/New-method-can-track-the-complete-activity-of- Proteins-in-living-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/New-method-can-track-the-complete-activity-of- Proteins-in-living-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=082a0916-e4c2-4798-bb8c-b6552f67019b Thu, 29 Jun 2023 22:33:34 -0400 New method can track the complete activity of proteins in living cells
较高的瘦肌肉质量可能有助于预防阿尔茨海默病开放获取期刊《BMJ Medicine》上发表的一项大型研究表明，高水平的瘦肌肉可能可以预防阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Higher-lean-muscle-mass-may-offer-protection-against-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Higher-lean-muscle-mass-may-offer-protection-against-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fa163fc-7810-4436-bccb-123b6ba56087 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 22:30:34 -0400 Higher lean muscle mass may offer protection against Alzheimer's disease
非侵入性技术可以帮助识别早产儿视网膜病变高风险婴儿芝加哥 Ann & Robert H. Lurie 儿童医院的研究承诺让许多早产儿免于接受侵入性眼科检查，以检测早产儿视网膜病变 (ROP)，这是美国儿童可预防的终身失明的最常见原因https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Non-guarantee-technique-can-help-identify-infants-at-high-risk-for-retinopathy-of-prematurity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Non-guarantee-technique-can-help-identify-infants-at-high-risk-for-retinopathy-of-prematurity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7be961b-1035-4460-b370-341e9b81b218 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 21:30:17 -0400 Non-invasive technique can help identify infants at high risk for retinopathy of prematurity
婴儿期接触微生物有助于免疫系统发育该研究论文探讨了早期生命环境因素和人体微生物组在特应性和哮喘发展中的作用。它强调了暴露对免疫功能的潜在影响，并提供了对儿童慢性炎症性疾病微生物介质的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Microbial-exposure-during-infancy-contributes-immune-system-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Microbial-exposure-during-infancy-contributes-immune-system-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49c855c5-f08d-4cd7-b7bb-ee757ef99b36 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 21:25:00 -0400 Microbial exposure during infancy contributes immune system development
孤独与糖尿病患者患心脏病的风险增加有关根据欧洲心脏病学会期刊《欧洲心脏杂志》今天发表的研究，孤独是糖尿病患者患心脏病的一个更大的危险因素，而不是饮食、运动、吸烟和抑郁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Loneiness-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-disease-in-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Loneiness-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-disease-in-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58cfeafe-4251-44b9-9a1a-6d405e251fbf Thu, 29 Jun 2023 21:20:50 -0400 Loneliness linked to increased risk of heart disease in diabetics
研究称长期新冠病毒不能被视为单一病症根据传染病开放论坛 5 月 31 日发布的全国性研究收集的新数据，长效新冠肺炎不是单一病症，也不应单独对待。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Long-COVID-cannot-be-treatment-as-a-single-condition-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Long-COVID-cannot-be-treatment-as-a-single-condition-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=089d7cc5-20de-4c87-96df-ece4136e47bf Thu, 29 Jun 2023 21:19:31 -0400 Long COVID cannot be treated as a single condition, study says
世界卫生组织宣布人工甜味剂阿斯巴甜可能致癌世界卫生组织最近表示，阿斯巴甜可能被宣布为“可能对人类致癌的物质”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/WHO-to-declare-artificial-sweetener-aspartame-as-possible-carcinogen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/WHO-to-declare-artificial-sweetener-aspartame-as-possible-carcinogen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=361127e5-6e43-4fa3-8c39-a89222fbdacb Thu, 29 Jun 2023 21:15:00 -0400 WHO to declare artificial sweetener aspartame as possible carcinogen
